meanings.sent1: The misgrafted tree struggled to grow properly in the new soil.
meanings.sent2: The misgrafted branches wilted and withered due to the failed grafting process.
meanings.sent3: The misgrafted plant looked like it was trying to dance with its roots in the air.
meanings.sent4: Her misgrafted ideas clashed like mismatched puzzle pieces, never fitting together.
meanings.sent5: The misgrafted flower stood out in the garden, its colors oddly mixed and captivating.

meanings.sent5: The misgrafted branches intertwined awkwardly, unable to support each other.
